title: Bassist for Television Was 77
desc: Fred Smith, bass player for the influential proto-punk band Television, died Thursday. He was 77. The band confirmed his death on Instagram.

title: Fluids, rest, and a broad-spectrum antiviral
desc: A UBC-led team of researchers has discovered two chemical compounds with potent and wide-ranging antiviral activity that protect mice from influenza A infection

title: Tinubu Pledges Timely Release of Sports Funding in Nigeria
desc: President Tinubu addresses chronic issues by promising timely sports funding in Nigeria starting in 2026 to boost athlete performance and infrastructure.

title: Quantum Error Fix Cuts Processing Time For Complex Problems Significantly
desc: Researchers have developed a deterministic error mitigation technique that allows for a direct comparison of noisy quantum computations with classical algorithms by reducing the computational cost of interpreting results from quantum experiments on Rydberg arrays.

title: Cancer survival fell and deaths rose during first two years of COVID-19
desc: COVID-19 care disruptions cut U.S. one-year cancer survival, adding 17,390 deaths; see which cancers and groups were hit hardest.
